sch:rule.sch:report: In the context of ODD customization, the listRef element must not self-nest.
In the context of ODD customization, the ptr or ref elements inside listRef must contain a target attribute, and that target attribute value must not contain spaces.

remarks.p: When listRef is used in elements from the tagdocs module for ODD customizations, it may only contain one or more ptr or ref elements. Within tagdocs, the children of listRef must contain a target attribute, and the value of that target attribute may not include spaces.
